description:
This market refers to the Counter-Strike match between Rebels Gaming and BASEMENT BOYS in the ESL Challenger League Europe Cup 1 Playoffs, scheduled for February 13 at 9:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Rebels Gaming" if Rebels Gaming win the match against BASEMENT BOYS.

This market will resolve to "BASEMENT BOYS" if BASEMENT BOYS win the match against Rebels Gaming.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://hltv.org/.

markets.description:
This market refers to the Counter-Strike match between Rebels Gaming and BASEMENT BOYS in the ESL Challenger League Europe Cup 1 Playoffs, scheduled for February 13 at 9:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Rebels Gaming" if Rebels Gaming win Map 1 against BASEMENT BOYS.

This market will resolve to "BASEMENT BOYS" if BASEMENT BOYS win Map 1 against Rebels Gaming.

markets.description:
This market refers to the Counter-Strike match between Rebels Gaming and BASEMENT BOYS in the ESL Challenger League Europe Cup 1 Playoffs, scheduled for February 13 at 9:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Over" if Rebels Gaming and BASEMENT BOYS play 3 or more games in this series.

If fewer than 3 games are played, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://hltv.org/.

This market refers to the Counter-Strike match between Rebels Gaming and BASEMENT BOYS in the ESL Challenger League Europe Cup 1 Playoffs, scheduled for February 13 at 9:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Rebels Gaming" if Rebels Gaming wins 2 or more maps than BASEMENT BOYS in this match.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "BASEMENT BOYS".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.
